Davie.Pembroke Lakes Mall:
Pembroke Lakes Mall is an indoor shopping center in Pembroke Pines, Florida that is located at the corner of State Road 820 (Pines Boulevard) and State Road 823 (Flamingo Road). Originally the third final Homart property, the mall has one floor and five anchors including JCPenney, 2 stores for Macy's and Dillard's, Sears, and an AMC movie theater which opened in 2017 on the west end of the mall.


== History ==
 The mall opened on October 21, 1992 with space for six anchor stores and only four of them were occupied with Burdines, JCPenney, Mervyns, and Sears.
